head.title: Metaverse SIGNIS World Congress Pre-registration
head.description: The SIGNIS World Congress 2022, with the theme of “Peace in the Digital World”, will be held both offline and online through a metaverse platform due to the restrictions caused by the COVID-19 pandemic. The Metaverse SIGNIS World Congress will enable 5 billion Gen Zs and Millennials as well as 1.3 billion Catholics around the world to participate in the event and to communicate one another. Join the Metaverse SIGNIS World Congress and enjoy your digital Catholic experience!

card1.p: The SIGNIS World Congress 2022, with the theme of “Peace in the Digital World”, will be held both offline and online through a metaverse platform due to the restrictions caused by the COVID-19 pandemic. The Metaverse SIGNIS World Congress will enable 5 billion Gen Zs and Millennials as well as 1.3 billion Catholics around the world to participate in the event and to communicate one another. Join the Metaverse SIGNIS World Congress and enjoy your digital Catholic experience!

ul: Those who completed the pre-registration will receive an SMS message with information about the Metaverse SIGNIS World Congress platform
Those who completed the pre-registration outside Korea will receive an email instead. If you do not see the email in your inbox, please check your spam or junk mail folder
With the official release of the Metaverse SIGNIS World Congress application, a download link may be added to this pre-registration website without prior notice

terms.label: Agree to collection and processing of personal information
ul:
Consent form for collection and use of personal information
Metaverse service operator GG56 Korea collects the following personal information for the SIGNIS World Congress 2022 event on Metaverse. If you refuse from providing personal information, you will not be able to receive advance participation information.
*Required: Name, Email address, OS, Event participation details
*Purpose: Participate in advance reservation events and App update notification e-mail
*Retention period: 90 days
※ However, the information can be held separately if it is required for investigating accidents, resolving disputes, handling customer services, or fulfilling legal obligations.

Refusal to consent
You have the right to refuse to consent to the collection and use of your personal information and please be aware of that there may be disadvantages such as not being able to use the booking service for Online and Instore Planning services.
